title: Global carbon budget shows emissions have spiked almost back to pre-pandemic levels
content:
1. Global carbon budget shows emissions have spiked almost back to pre-pandemic levels  The Washington Post
  2. Globe bounces back to nearly 2019 carbon pollution levels  Associated Press
  3. Stanford study shows carbon emissions nearing pre-pandemic levels as economy rebounds  ABC7 News Bay Area
  4. Carbon Dioxide Emissions Rebounded Sharply After Pandemic Dip  The New York Times
  5. More bad news for climate change: Pandemic dip in carbon emissions was temporary, report says  USA TODAY
contentSnippet:
Global carbon budget shows emissions have spiked almost back to pre-pandemic levels  The Washington Post
Globe bounces back to nearly 2019 carbon pollution levels  Associated Press
Stanford study shows carbon emissions nearing pre-pandemic levels as economy rebounds  ABC7 News Bay Area
Carbon Dioxide Emissions Rebounded Sharply After Pandemic Dip  The New York Times
More bad news for climate change: Pandemic dip in carbon emissions was temporary, report says  USA TODAY
